message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. My initial offer is $1,200,000.

Alice, while I appreciate your offer, $1,200,000 is significantly higher than my budget. I'm very interested in the product, but I'm only able to offer $850,000 at this time.  Let me know what you think.
I understand that $1,200,000 is a bit steep for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $850,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to consider $1,050,000.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down on your price, but $1,050,000 is still too high for me. I'm prepared to go up to $900,000. This is a fair price for both of us, considering my budget and the value of the product to you.  Let's close this deal.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, Bob. However, I'm still not convinced that $900,000 is enough to justify the value of the product. I'm willing to consider one more concession, but I need to make $950,000 to make it worth my while.
